names.fullName: ApoE3 binding to tau tandem repeat I is abolished by tau serine262 phosphorylation.

attributeList.attribute: Huang D.Y., Weisgraber K.H., Goedert M., Saunders A.M., Roses A.D., Strittmatter W.J.
Cardiac - Interactions involving cardiac related proteins

Human tau peptides were incubated with either ApoE3 or ApoE4. After the incubation, proteins were submitted to electrophoresis and transferred to a membrane that was incubated with the anti-tau serum 135 primary antibody.
Apo E purified from human plasma confirmed in reference 19: Rall S.C. et al 1986 (PMID: 3724506)
Phosphorylation of Serine 579 of Tau protein peptide I completely disrupts its interaction with ApoE3
